adjectives.description: behemothic (comparative more behemothic, superlative most behemothic)

entries.meaning: colossal, of enormous size and power.
examples: Oozing and surging up out of that yawning trap-door in the Cyclopean crypt I had glimpsed such an unbelievable behemothic monstrosity that I could not doubt the power of its original to kill with its mere sight.
